DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness acupuncture treat woman 's health condition .
DOC.detailed_description: This trial comprise three study . In first two study , woman randomly assign receive either real sham acupuncture therapy . Study 1 include woman various form cancer . White blood cell count use assess effect acupuncture participant ' immune response . Study 2 include woman unspecified pelvic pain endometriosis ; self-report pain scale use assess effect acupuncture participant ' symptom . Study 3 evaluate validity reliability diagnosis make Chinese medicine practitioner . In study , group Chinese medicine practitioner diagnose group patient ; consistency diagnose evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Study 1 : Newly diagnose ovarian cancer ; primary peritoneal cancer ; papillary serous cancer endometrium ; mixed mesodermal tumor uterus , ovary , fallopian tube Currently undergo chemotherapy Meet certain laboratory test requirement Inclusion Criteria Study 2 : Currently close recruitment Diagnosed endometriosis unspecified pelvic pain Exclusion Criteria Studies 1 2 : Use white blood cell booster Prior radiotherapy exception wholebreast irradiation breast cancer Prior myelotoxic chemotherapy History symptomatic cardiac psychiatric disorder Use pacemaker Use herb herbal supplement Prior use acupuncture Enrollment research study
